tool_description: Evaluates skin discoloration, dark spots, and pigmentation irregularities to assess hyperpigmentation concerns.

dark_spot_count.description: Number of visible dark spots or patches (0-100)

overall_evenness.description: Overall skin tone evenness (1-5, where 1=very uneven, 5=very even)

error_messages: Invalid spot count: dark_spot_count must be integer between 0-100.
Invalid spot sizes: spot_sizes array can contain 0-5 string items.
Invalid pigmentation causes: pigmentation_causes array can contain 0-8 string items.
Invalid evenness scale: overall_evenness must be integer between 1-5.
Inconsistent pigmentation data: High spot count should correlate with low evenness score.
usage: Examine skin in natural lighting and count all visible dark spots, patches, and areas of discoloration. Consider sun damage, acne marks, age spots, and hormonal pigmentation.
